Rec: Don’t Make Me Think

Some key things to remember after reading Don&#8217;t Make Me Think by usability guru Steve Krug: &#8211; Add appropriate alt text to every image &#8211; Use headings correctly &#8211; Make your forms work with screen readers &#8211; Put a “skip to main content” link at the beginning of every page &#8211; make all content accessible [&hellip;]
